pageContext.claim: “The only problem our economy has is the Fed. They don't have a feel for the Market, they don't understand necessary Trade Wars or Strong Dollars or even Democrat Shutdowns over Borders. The Fed is like a powerful golfer who can’t score because he has no touch - he can't putt!”
pageContext.analysis: This is an unusual attack on the independent Federal Reserve by a president. Trump is reacting to the sharp drop in the stock market, which took place for a variety of reasons, including a perception that the president was considering firing the Fed chairman. Trump more than 100 times took credit for the stock market rise early in his presidency, but how he tries to shift the blame for its decline.
